mapper.insert: insert into w_collect (collect_id, collect_userid, collect_spuid, collect_time) values (#{collectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collectUserid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collectSpuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collectTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select collect_id, collect_userid, collect_spuid, collect_time from w_collect
